description: Terres-en-Villes is a pioneering association focused on agricultural and food policies, bridging urban and rural communities. Established in 2020, it fosters collaboration among towns and agricultural fields to promote sustainable food systems. Led by Florent Lardique, the initiative emphasizes protecting agricultural land and enhancing food access through innovative policies. By facilitating dialogue and cooperation among diverse stakeholders, Terres-en-Villes aims to drive ecological and food transitions, ensuring a balanced relationship between urban development and agriculture.
name: Terres-en-Villes
